title: 204 - The Immigration Crisis - With Matthew Soerens
description:
Mike has a very insightful conversation with Matthew Soerens from 'World Relief,' on the in's and out's of the immigration crisis we're facing today. What is the legal process? How do we respond as Christians? What is the biblical calling?
 
Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
